# Publications

```{r}
# load from a file
# knitr::write_bib(c("vitae", "tibble"), "packages.bib")

# load from ORCID
# knit requires ORCID_TOKEN in .Renviron
# rcrossref requires crossref_email in .Renviron
ORCID = '0000-0002-6723-8940'
my_works <- rorcid::works(ORCID)
# get rid of the "works" class so you can use filter
my_works <- as_tibble(my_works)
my_works <- filter(my_works, type == "journal-article")
# add the "works" class back in so you can use rorcid functions
class(my_works) <- "works"
my_dois <- rorcid::identifiers(my_works)
my_uris <- stringr::str_c("", my_dois, sep="https://doi.org/")
pubs <- rcrossref::cr_cn(dois = my_uris, format = "bibtex")
invisible(lapply(pubs, write, "pubs.bib", append=FALSE))
bibliography_entries("pubs.bib") %>%
  arrange(desc(author$family), issued)
```
